user_query: I'm organizing a charity event and want to create a social media campaign with funny memes. Can you help me find the top memes from the subreddit 'charity' on Reddit and also check if the .net domain 'charityfun' is available for our event website?

TaskList.description: Fetch the top memes from the subreddit 'charity' on Reddit.
Check the availability of the .net domain 'charityfun'.
